page.topic: Refresh table information after editing table schema(s)
page.description: Referesh the table structure information that is stored for a data bound UX component. Required if table fields are added or field types are changed.
page.discussion: If you make any changes to the structure of any tables that are bound to the UX component, this command will refresh the information stored about each column in the data bound tables. It is *[very important]* that you execute this command if you add new fields to any of the tables or change the data type of any fields.
